com.link_intersystems.lang.ref.Reference

  • Packages that use Reference 
    Package Description
    com.link_intersystems.lang.ref
    Provides extensions for the java.lang.ref package.
    com.link_intersystems.lang.reflect  

    • Uses of Reference in com.link_intersystems.lang.ref

      Subinterfaces of Reference in com.link_intersystems.lang.ref 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  MutableReference<T>
      A MutableReference's referent can be set by clients.
      interface  ObservableReference<T>
      A Reference that notifes Observers when it's referent changes.
      interface  SerializableReference<T>
      Represents a Reference that is Serializable.
      Classes in com.link_intersystems.lang.ref that implement Reference 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractSerializableReference<T>
      A reference to an object that is not serializable but can be restored out of other information (e.g.
      class  CopyOnAccessReference<T extends Serializable>
      A Reference that copies the referent on every CopyOnAccessReference.get() call by serialization/deserialization.
      class  DefaultMutableReference<T>
      A MutableReference implementation that just uses a field to store the reference to another object.
      class  HardReference<T>
      A Reference implementation that just holds a reference to the referent object.
      class  NullReference<T> 
      class  NullSafeReference<T>
      A Reference that implements the null object pattern.
      class  ObservableReferenceAdapter<T> 
      class  SerializableObjectReference<T>
      An adaption for any Serializable object to the Reference interface.
      class  ThreadLocalReference<T>
      Adapts a ThreadLocal to a Reference.
